excerpt.rendered: The Data Management Group provides expertise in data planning, collection, standardization, documentation, storage, sharing, and long-term preservation. The core focus of the Data Management Group’s work is development and maintenance of the integrated Rule-Oriented Data System (iRODS), which is open-source data management software that enables research and commercial organizations, government agencies, and mission critical environments worldwide to test, document, control, and protect their data.

description.simple_value_formatted: The Data Management Group provides expertise in data planning, collection, standardization, documentation, storage, sharing, and long-term preservation. The core focus of the Data Management Group’s work is development and maintenance of the integrated Rule-Oriented Data System (iRODS), which is open-source data management software that enables research and commercial organizations, government agencies, and mission critical environments worldwide to test, document, control, and protect their data.

yoast_head_json.og_description: The Data Management Group provides expertise in data planning, collection, standardization, documentation, storage, sharing, and long-term preservation. The core focus of the Data Management Group’s work is development and maintenance of the integrated Rule-Oriented Data System (iRODS), which is open-source data management software that enables research and commercial organizations, government agencies, and mission critical environments worldwide to test, document, control, and protect their data.

excerpt.rendered: The Software Architecture group develops cloud computing data science platforms and environments. The Software Architecture group also designs scalable knowledge management methods including full-text search systems augmented with knowledge graphs and machine learning models.

description.simple_value_formatted: The Software Architecture group develops cloud computing data science platforms and environments. These include the HeLx platform used in neuroscience, plant genomics, and clinical research projects. The Software Architecture group also designs scalable knowledge management methods including full-text search systems augmented with knowledge graphs and machine learning models.
description.value_formatted: The Software Architecture group develops cloud computing data science platforms and environments. These include the HeLx platform used in neuroscience, plant genomics, and clinical research projects. The Software Architecture group also designs scalable knowledge management methods including full-text search systems augmented with knowledge graphs and machine learning models.
description.value: The Software Architecture group develops cloud computing data science platforms and environments. These include the HeLx platform used in neuroscience, plant genomics, and clinical research projects. The Software Architecture group also designs scalable knowledge management methods including full-text search systems augmented with knowledge graphs and machine learning models.

excerpt.rendered: RENCI creates cyberinfrastructure solutions that enhance scientific research. With expertise in networking, architectures, distributed systems, and applications, our work enables secure and efficient collaboration and data management for cutting-edge computer science and data-intensive domain research.

yoast_head_json.title: Networking Research and Infrastructure - RENCI
yoast_head_json.og_description: RENCI creates cyberinfrastructure solutions that enhance scientific research. With expertise in networking, architectures, distributed systems, and applications, our work enables secure and efficient collaboration and data management for cutting-edge computer science and data-intensive domain research.

excerpt.rendered: The Earth Data Science (EDS) Group focuses on projects that advance fundamental science and support and inform decision-making in critical areas like climate, weather, natural hazards, and environmental health. They explore how data science, team science, and knowledge management can address complex issues in the coastal hazards, environment and health (geohealth), and geo-related sociotechnical spaces through their combined expertise in software engineering, geospatial analytics, machine learning, ocean modeling, and remote sensing. Their work aims to inform better planning, response, and resilience strategies.

description.simple_value_formatted: The Earth Data Science (EDS) Group focuses on projects that advance fundamental science and support and inform decision-making in critical areas like climate, weather, natural hazards, and environmental health. They explore how data science, team science, and knowledge management can address complex issues in the coastal hazards, environment and health (geohealth), and geo-related sociotechnical spaces through their combined expertise in software engineering, geospatial analytics, machine learning, ocean modeling, and remote sensing. Their work aims to inform better planning, response, and resilience strategies.

Their work aims to inform better planning, response, and resilience strategies.

They explore how data science, team science, and knowledge management can address complex issues in the coastal hazards, environment and health (geohealth), and geo-related sociotechnical spaces through their combined expertise in software engineering, geospatial analytics, machine learning, ocean modeling, and remote sensing. Their work aims to inform better planning, response, and resilience strategies.

yoast_head_json.title: Earth Data Science - RENCI
yoast_head_json.og_description: The Earth Data Science (EDS) Group focuses on projects that advance fundamental science and support and inform decision-making in critical areas like climate, weather, natural hazards, and environmental health. They explore how data science, team science, and knowledge management can address complex issues in the coastal hazards, environment and health (geohealth), and geo-related sociotechnical spaces through their combined expertise in software engineering, geospatial analytics, machine learning, ocean modeling, and remote sensing. Their work aims to inform better planning, response, and resilience strategies.

excerpt.rendered: The Analytics and Data Science Group partners with researchers across a broad range of domains to advance their research by the application of analytics. The group takes a broad approach to analytics including AI and machine learning, visual analytics, and semantic web and knowledge graphs, among other techniques.

projects.simple_value_formatted:
• A Scalable Platform for Exploring and Analyzing Whole Brain Tissue Cleared Images
  • Data Translator ARAGORN
  • Data Translator CAM/AOP Knowledge Provider
  • Data Translator Standards and Reference Implementations
  • Data Translator: ICEES+ Knowledge Provider
  • FHIRCat: Enabling the Semantics of FHIR & Clinical Terminologies
  • AI Tool for Extraction of Roadside Hazards from Videolog Data and LIDAR
  • HEAL Data Stewardship Group
  • HuBMAP HIVE Collaboration Component (CC)
  • Imageomics Institute
  • MATRIX
  • NCATS Biomedical Data Translator
  • NC TraCS
  • Creating Computable Clade Definitions in the Web Ontology Language (OWL)
  • Preservice Educators Reimagining Core Experiences in Physics Teaching (PERCEPT)
  • ROBOKOP
  • Semantic Infrastructure for Gene Ontology
  • UNC Superfund Research Program – Data Management and Analysis Core (DMAC)
  • Counterfactual-Based Supports for Visual Causal Inference
  • Visual Analytics Techniques for Tracking and Communicating Bias in Cohort Selection
  • Atlantic Coast Center for Infectious Disease Dynamics and Analytics Supplement (ACCIDDA)
  • Skin Microbiome and Host Genetics
  • Monkey Health Explorer
  • Dug Semantic Search
  • GeneSight
  • MM-ARIEL: Unified and Fair Multimodal Representation Learning for Autoimmune Diseases
  • Galapagos Reptile Health Explorer
  • HEAL LitCoin Knowledge Graph

related_posts.simple_value_formatted: • RENCI receives $1.4 million NSF award to help develop an expansive public-data infrastructure

  • UNC Research Week | AI-Powered Solutions for Scientific Discoveries
